title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 393.5 - Allowance of attorney's fee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 393.5 - Allowance of attorney's fee

State Regulations

In allowing a fee to an attorney or licensed
representative, the referee shall state specifically the manner in which such
fee shall be deducted from the payments due the claimants or dependents. The
direction for payment of an attorney's fee out of the aggregate trust fund
shall specifically state the manner of payment and amount of the fee of the
attorney or licensed representative. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
393.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
